question: 窃盗
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: You decided to <kanji>steal</kanji>... and then you <kanji>steal</kanji> again a few minutes later! Now you're wanted for <vocabulary>theft</vocabulary>. <vocabulary>Stealing</vocabulary> is wrong, you should have known better!
